text: Elmwood Park Community Unit School District 401 (EPCUSD 401) is a school district headquartered in Elmwood Park, Illinois. In 2019 the board approved a new infrastructure plan that voters were to vote on in a referendum worth $55 million held on March 17, 2020. ==Schools== ; Secondary schools * Elmwood Park High School (9-12) * Elm Middle School (7-8) ; Elementary schools (1-6) * Elmwood Elementary School * John Mills Elementary School ; Preschool and Kindergarten * Early Childhood Center ==References== ==External links== * Elmwood Park Community Unit School District 401 Category:School districts in Cook County, Illinois
title: Elmwood Park Community Unit School District 401
